fullplot: A scene from The Bells (1926) is optically reprinted and edited to Michael Gordonès 7 minute composition. A meditation on the fleeting nature of life and love, as seen through the roiling emulsion of an film.
plot: A scene from The Bells (1926) is optically reprinted and edited to Michael Gordonès 7 minute composition. A meditation on the fleeting nature of life and love, as seen through the roiling emulsion of an film.
title: Light Is Calling
